mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doctors (user_id, department, specialization, cabinet) VALUES (#{id},#{department},#{specialization},#{cabinet})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id as doctor_id, department as "doctor_department", specialization as "doctor_specialization", cabinet as "doctor_cabinet", user_info.name as doctor_name, user_info.surname as doctor_surname, user_info.fatherhood as doctor_fatherhood FROM hospital.doctors left join hospital.user_info on user_info.id = doctors.user_id WHERE user_id = #{id}
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM doctors WHERE user_id = #{id})
